title: Last Two Bedroom Apartment Available! Don't Miss Out | Call To Tour!
posting_body: ['Alexan NoHo West', '11950 Erwin St, North Hollywood, CA, 91606', 'Want more information?', 'Follow this link:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 77', 'OR Text', '77', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our leasing team.', 'LUXE APARTMENT RESIDENCES COMING 2022!', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1247 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome to North Hollywood’s most stylish residence, conveniently located within NoHo West – a vibrant new retail and dining destination.', 'This unique address surrounds you with walkable shops, restaurants, services and green spaces, all just steps from your front door.', 'The designer rental homes feature fresh, modern interiors alongside a luxe “staycation” worthy amenity collection, highlighted by sun-splashed pools, well-appointed social spaces, serene indoor-outdoor retreats and plenty of spots to entertain and escape.', 'All accompanied by great shopping and dining right across the street.', 'It’s a whole new direction for NoHo – join the list and be one of the first to discover it.', 'Features', '- Selection of three designer finish palettes', '- Undermount stainless steel sinks with custom Symmons plumbing fixtures', '- Quartz countertops', '- Modern bathrooms', '- Tile tub/shower surrounds with glass enclosures', '- Backless gas ranges', '- Full size stackable washers / dryers in every home', '- Multiple studio, one- and two-bedroom floor plans', '- Plush Berber style carpet in bedrooms', '- Luxurious walk-in shower available*', '- Full height tile backsplashes', '- Keyless electronic entry door locks', '- Two styles of cabinetry', '- Nest thermostats', "- Generous 9' ceilings", '- Hardwood-style flooring in kitchens, living rooms and hallways', '- Gourmet kitchens', '- Large soaking tubs', '- Samsung stainless steel appliances', '*in select units', 'Community Amenities', '- Directly adjacent to NoHo West shopping center', '- Organic Courtyards sprinkled', '- Sky Deck BBQs, flat screen TV and luxe seating arrangements', '- Luxe Pool & Spa', '- Club Lounge', '- Private conference suite', '- Fire feature', '- Pet-friendly community', '- High speed WiFi by GigaMonster in all common areas', '- Central location with easy access to the 170,134, 5 and 101 freeways', '- Gourmet entertaining kitchen, dining area with custom built-in seating', '- Mail Center with 24-hour access Amazon lockers', '- Fire pits', '- Poolside flat screen TVs', '- Outdoor lounge spaces', '- Bike Repair Shop', '- Oversized package and cold storage', '- Pool Lounge', '- Lounge deck with dining tables and seating', '- Outdoor grills', '- Pet washing and grooming station', '- Poolside large bar', '- Billiards and shuffleboard', '- Bike storage area', '- Social seating spaces', '- Sky Deck on top floor overlooking the skyline', '- TV wall', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet friendly.', 'lA2MZ9ODRBA3']
